title: Quick Low-FODMAP Breakfast Bowl
summary: A delicious and nutritious breakfast that's safe during your washout period and takes only 10 minutes to prepare.
content:
# Quick Low-FODMAP Breakfast Bowl

## Ingredients

- 1 cup cooked quinoa or rice
- 1 medium banana, sliced
- 1/4 cup blueberries
- 1 tablespoon peanut butter (check for no added garlic/onion)
- 1 tablespoon maple syrup
- Pinch of cinnamon
- Lactose-free milk or almond milk (small serving)

## Instructions

1. Warm the cooked quinoa or rice in the microwave for 1-2 minutes
2. Top with sliced banana and blueberries
3. Drizzle with peanut butter and maple syrup
4. Sprinkle with cinnamon
5. Add a splash of lactose-free milk if desired

## Nutrition Notes

This bowl provides sustained energy with complex carbohydrates, healthy fats, and natural sweetness. All ingredients are low-FODMAP in the portions listed.

## Variations

- Swap banana for strawberries (limit to 5 medium berries)
- Use almond butter instead of peanut butter
- Add a sprinkle of chia seeds for extra fiber
author: FODMAP Nutrition Team
